body.p: Caspar Hebel Chales Hartling John Zoll & Charles Hannger John Miller Henry Melcher state that they are citizens of Louisville Ky that they knew William Medard decd. and also Jacob Medard who was sentenced to 5 years imprisonment in the Penitentiary of Ky at the last Jany term of the Jefferson circuit court -- that the mental capacity of both was of a very low order. They ^have^ known the sd Jacob well, living in the immediate neighborhood of him for some 12 or 14 years. & the old man the father for several years -- That sd. Jacob never was able to speak the language of this country. That he was industrious & honest in his business as a shoemaker making a bare support for his wife & children --

C B Hebel
Chas. Hartling.
Johann Zoll
John Moeller
Charles Hauneys
Subscribed & sworn to before me by Caspar Heleb Charles Hartling John Zoll Charles Hannger John Miller Henry Melcher these all respectable citizens of Louisville. this 6 August 1864
A. W. Waller J. P. J. C.
